remarks.format: ## Remarks 类继承自 ASP.NET类。The class inherits from the ASP.NET class. 若要指定移动页面并使用 ASP.NET 移动控件，ASP.NET 移动 Web 窗体页面必须包含以下页指令。To specify a mobile page and use ASP.NET mobile controls, an ASP.NET mobile Web Forms page must contain the following page directive. ``` <%@ Page Inherits="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobilePage" Language="c#" %> ``` 需要 `Inherits` 属性。The `Inherits` attribute is required. `Language`如果需要将属性设置为在页上，使用的语言。The `Language` attribute is set to the language that is used on the page, if it is needed. > [!NOTE] > ASP.NET 移动页面允许的每一页上的多个移动窗体，而 ASP.NET Web pages 允许每页只有一个窗体。ASP.NET mobile pages allow for multiple mobile forms on each page, whereas ASP.NET Web pages allow for only one form per page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 最初呈现页面时，会自动成为活动页中的第一个窗体。When a page is initially rendered, the first form in the page is automatically made active. 在后续回发，另一种形式可能会处于活动状态，通过以编程方式设置此属性，或由于用户导航通过控件。On subsequent postbacks, another form might be made active, either by programmatically setting this property, or as a result of user navigation through a control. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性的控件。The following example demonstrates how to use the property of a control. 如果当前的移动设备允许控件的访问密钥，该按钮将显示提交窗体的访问密钥。If the current mobile device allows for access keys for controls, the button will display the access key that submits the form. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单个文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件可能无法正常运行。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks 除了接口，ASP.NET 页面框架提供了`CustomAttributes`字典，使您能够指定其他属性，可以启用或禁用自定义特性设置，或调整控件的行为或呈现。In addition to the interface, the ASP.NET page framework provides a `CustomAttributes` dictionary that allows you to specify additional attributes, enable or disable custom attributing, or adjust a control's behavior or rendering. 若要启用或禁用自定义属性，您可以设置属性设置为`true`，或者可以设置`allowCustomAttributes`属性的 <`mobileControls`> 到 web.config `true`。To enable or disable custom attributing, you can either set the property to `true`, or you can set the `allowCustomAttributes` attribute of the <`mobileControls`> section of Web.config to `true`. > [!NOTE] > 如果启用了自定义属性，属性名称中的版式错误可以被解释为自定义属性。When custom attributes are enabled, typographic errors in property names can be interpreted as custom attributes. 例如，如果开发人员错误地指定控件"的属性，分析器会将其保存为自定义人员"而不是引发异常。For example, if a developer incorrectly specifies the property of a control as "Txet", the parser would save it as a custom attribute called "Txet" instead of raising an exception. 出于此原因，默认情况下禁用自定义属性。For this reason, custom attributes are disabled by default. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来启用自定义`AccessKey`特性，可以在。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to enable the custom `AccessKey` attribute on the . > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单个文件代码模型，如果将其直接在代码隐藏文件中复制可能无法正常运行。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if you copy it directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空文本文件。You must copy this code sample into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 控件创建客户端脚本引发回发事件的服务器上。ASP.NET controls create client-side scripts to raise postback events on the server. 它是恶意的用户可以使用回发脚本将发送到服务器控件的任何发送事件。It is possible for a malicious user to use the postback script to send arbitrary post events to server controls. 出于此原因，ASP.NET 2.0 控件验证以确保由该控件呈现的客户端代码引发事件的事件数据。For this reason, ASP.NET version 2.0 controls validate the event data to ensure that the event was raised by client-side code rendered by the control. 在移动页中不支持事件验证。Event validation is not supported in mobile pages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法主要由.NET Framework 基础结构和不应在代码中直接使用。This method is primarily used by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 但是，控件开发人员可以重写此方法以指定自定义服务器控件还原其视图状态的方式。However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce). 此成员重写方法，并将任何现有的适配器状态保存在一个对象数组中的视图状态。This member overrides the method and saves any existing adapter state with the view state in an object array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性按照 URL 中的问号 （？） 在请求中返回的任何字符。The property returns any characters in the request that follow the question mark (?) in the URL. 此值可以是不同于属性。This value can be different from the property. 对于设备唯一文件路径后缀插入回发的 URL，此属性自动去除文件路径后缀。For devices where a unique file path suffix is inserted into a URL for postback, this property automatically strips out the file path suffix. 例如，如果原始查询为"/ home.aspx?id=john+doe"，值属性将为"id = john doe"。For example, if the original query is "/home.aspx?id=john+doe", the value of the property will be "id=john+doe". URL 可以是以下回发"/home.aspx?_ufps=20292303920 和 id = john doe"。A following postback URL could be "/home.aspx?_ufps=20292303920&id=john+doe". 在此最后一个回发的值属性将再次变得"id = john doe"，因为将去除的唯一后缀。On this last postback, the value of the property will again be "id=john+doe", because the unique suffix will be stripped out. > [!CAUTION] > 如果键/值对的键部分存储在属性是与相同上的控件的属性对象、 视图状态和键/值对都将从中属性。If the key portion of the key/value pair stored in the property is the same as the property of a control on the object, the view state and the key/value pair are removed from the property.
